author: jsalfeld
body:
roducers

#### PR description:

This is a back port of:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31962

It includes changes to Scouting Producers and data formats. Due to the back port from 11.2.X, there are 4 small additional changes for which I checked that it compiles and the scouting event content is filled. 

The differences are:

1.) removal of <use name="FWCore/Utilities"/> in DataFormats/Scouting/BuildFile.xml
2.) replacing outRho.reset(new double(*rho)); with outRho = std::make_unique<double>(*rho); and alike for MET in HLTrigger/JetMET/plugins/HLTScoutingPFProducer.cc

#### PR validation:

backport is needed for timely release of Run-3 scouting investigations
title: Change track muon dataformats scouting (11.1.x)
